snippet: A slump in European and Chinese stocks weighed on the market, but the Nasdaq ended higher as small-capitalization stocks rallied.
abstract: Stocks end slightly lower, avoiding sharp declines in Europe and Asia thanks to rally in beleaguered energy companies.
lead_paragraph: A slump in European and Chinese stocks weighed on the market, but the Nasdaq ended higher as small-capitalization stocks rallied.

headline.main: U.S. Market Steady After Oil Rebound, While Foreign Indexes Fall
headline.print_headline: U.S. Market Steady After Oil Rebound, While Foreign Indexes Fall
